comments:
This is a regression due to fixing bug 154207: There are occasions, on which no error message should be displayed even when an exception is thrown from the service.

Connect to a remote system via ssh.
Create a new empty directory from RSE.
Select a file, choose Copy.
Select the directory, choose Paste.

--> Exception is printed on stderr:

org.eclipse.rse.services.files.RemoteFileIOException: Operation failed. File system input or output error
	at org.eclipse.rse.services.ssh.files.SftpFileService.makeSystemMessageException(SftpFileService.java:159)
	at org.eclipse.rse.services.ssh.files.SftpFileService.getFile(SftpFileService.java:180)
	at org.eclipse.rse.subsystems.files.core.servicesubsystem.FileServiceSubSystem.getFile(FileServiceSubSystem.java:306)
	at org.eclipse.rse.subsystems.files.core.servicesubsystem.FileServiceSubSystem.getRemoteFileObject(FileServiceSubSystem.java:153)
	at org.eclipse.rse.files.ui.view.SystemViewRemoteFileAdapter.doDrop(SystemViewRemoteFileAdapter.java:1798)
	at org.eclipse.rse.ui.view.SystemDNDTransferRunnable.transferRSEResources(SystemDNDTransferRunnable.java:247)
	at org.eclipse.rse.ui.view.SystemDNDTransferRunnable.run(SystemDNDTransferRunnable.java:531)
Fixed -- getFile() API was not implemented correctly

traces.message: Operation failed. File system input or output error
